title: Did Betsy DeVos Say History Textbooks Should Be Based on the Bible?
subtitle: A report stating that Trump's Secretary of Education wants to exclude all information not found in the Bible from history textbooks is satire, not fact.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Newly installed U.S. Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos stipulated that "all history books will contain only the information that can also be found in the Christian Bible."
